titleStmt.title: A letter from Sir Lewis Dyve: written out of France to a gentleman, a friend of his in London. Giving him an account of the manner of his escape out of the Kings Bench, and the reasons that moved him thereunto.
titleStmt.author: Dyre, Lewis, Sir, 1599-1669.

notesStmt.note: Annotation on Thomason copy: "Feb: 24"; the 8 in imprint date is crossed out and replaced with "7".
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
